item.title: Aadha Bato - Episode 1
item.ns0:subtitle: Aadha Bato - 1
item.description: Aadha Bato - Episode 1 Report issues with episodes at https://github.com/abpaudel/nepali-audiobooks/issues. Aadha Bato Novel is the Nepali Novel written by the Nepali famous and popular writer Krishna Dharabasi. Aadha bato is the autobiography type novel which defined life of the novelist Dharabasi. Krishna has written this novel such a beautiful way that it touches the heart . Listen Nepali Novel Aadha Bato online here from the radio Program Shruti Sambeg with Achyut Ghimire. For more information about Krishna Dharabasi Visit Krishna Dharabasi. Listen Aadha Bato Aadha Bato 1 . Aadha Bato 2 . Aadha Bato 3 . Aadha Bato 4 . Aadha Bato 5 . Aadha Bato 6 . Aadha Bato 7 . Aadha Bato | Autobiography of Krishna Dharabasi Aadha Bato in Audio VersionListen to Aadha Bato from Achyut Ghimire’s voice. Source : Ujyaalo 90 Network (http://www.unn.com.np/) Writer : Krishna Dharabasi One of my favorite. It will take few seconds depending upon your network. So please check the connection and rendering status on player.
